Room.Name: The Shore of the Sea of Agape
Room.Description: Sands of a beautiful yellow colour stretch out to the south, while to the west a beautiful sea of blue and green can be seen. You notice towards what seems to be the middle of the see is an island with a blindingly white building upon it.

Room.Name: The Shore of the Sea of Agape

Room.Name: Just Off the Shore
Room.Description: The sea is rather comfortable in temperature, it feels like silky warm bath water. You can stretch out and swim as long as you want without being worried about bumping into someone else. It is so nice floating here you feel as if you could fall asleep and no danger would come to you.

Room.Name: On the Sea of Agape
Room.Description: The water is a crystal blue and green colour. Just below the surface you can see there is much movement. On the water you feel at peace with the world and a great happiness enters your heart. You can see out in the distance that there are life forms moving around.

Room.Name: A Small Island
Room.Description: The sand on here is very different from the sand on the shore. It seems softer, and is a brilliant white colour. Looking around you notice that the island isn't very big, maybe only a mile in each direction. There is what looks like a stair case, but it does not look to be held up by anything. The stairs are an opaque white marble looking material. You feel the strong urge to go up them.

Room.Description: The water is a crystal blue and green colour. Just below the surface you can see there is much movement. On the water you feel at peace with the world and a great happiness enters your heart. You can see out in the distance that there are life forms moving around.

Room.Name: A Beautiful Staircase
Room.Description: This stair case is all together unordinary, but you can't help but be in awe of it. It doesn't feel like you are really walking on anything, it's almost as if you are walking on air, so you have to continually keep looking down to make sure you are not going to lose your footing and fall.

Room.Name: A Great Arch
Room.Description: The stairs have finally ended into this magnificent entrance. You can tell it is a grand place and someone important must live here, why else would someone take the great trouble of building such an extravigant building. Noticing you are above the clouds is a little unsettling, but the creature with wings peering at you has caught your interest.

Room.Name: A Hallway of Grandure
Room.Description: This long hallway has two large and very long windows on each side. Each window has a beautiful view of clouds and the sea mingled together. The floor has very ornate rugs going through the middle of the room. You see movement in the next room and a smell of roses is now wafting through the air.

Room.Name: A Shrine of Peace and Love
Room.Description: This room is in the shape of a gazebo, instead of walls the room is open and what little wall is left is in the shape of polls. Obviously this place was made with great love and care, it just eminates from the scenery and the structure in which you are standing. Looking around it is hard not to notice the beautiful life-like statue in the middle of the room.
